overview.en: Open Predict Token (OPT) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Open Predict Token has a current supply of 9,900,000 with 999,478.314 in circulation. The last known price of Open Predict Token is 2.72483168 USD and is up 1.51 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 4 active market(s) with $20,193.95 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://openpredict.io/.
